question:
An office held a Secret Santa gift exchange where each of its twelve employees was assigned one other employee in the group to present with a gift. Each employee filled out a profile including three likes or hobbies. On the day of the gift exchange, only eleven gifts were given, each one specific to one of the recipient's interests. Based on the information in the document, who did not give a gift?

[Note: There is an attached file at path: /Users/charles/spec_tool_call/gaia_dataset/level1/example_007/cffe0e32-c9a6-4c52-9877-78ceb4aaa9fb.docx]

trajectory.question:
An office held a Secret Santa gift exchange where each of its twelve employees was assigned one other employee in the group to present with a gift. Each employee filled out a profile including three likes or hobbies. On the day of the gift exchange, only eleven gifts were given, each one specific to one of the recipient's interests. Based on the information in the document, who did not give a gift?

[Note: There is an attached file at path: /Users/charles/spec_tool_call/gaia_dataset/level1/example_007/cffe0e32-c9a6-4c52-9877-78ceb4aaa9fb.docx]

tool_executed.name: file_read
tool_executed.result:
DOCX Content (47 paragraphs, 816 characters):

Employees

Harry

Rebecca

Georgette

Micah

Perry

Tyson

Lucy

Jun

Sara

 Miguel

 Fred

 Alex

Gift Assignments

Profiles

Harry: Fishing, Camping, Wine

Rebecca: Cars, Dogs, Chocolate

Georgette: Yoga, Cooking, Green Energy

Micah: Knitting, Rainy Weather, Books

Perry: Old Movies, Rats, Journaling

Tyson: Historical Fiction Novels, Biking, Parakeets

Lucy: Coffee, Physics, Board Games 

Jun: Woodworking, Barbecue, JavaScript

Sara: Tabletop RPGs, Spas, Music

Miguel: Astronomy, Decorative Washi Tape, Ketchup

Fred: Chemistry, Perl, Cats

Alex: Surfing, Audrey Hepburn, Manga

Gifts:

Galileo Galilei biography

Fishing reel

Raku programming guide

Chisel set

Custom dice

“War and Peace” American film copy

Yarn

“One Piece” graphic novel

“War and Peace” novel

Starbucks gift card

Foam exercise mat

trajectory.actor_reasoning:
Match each gift to a unique profile interest:
- Fishing reel → Harry (fishing)
- Chisel set → Jun (woodworking)
- Custom dice → Sara (tabletop RPGs)
- Yarn → Micah (knitting)
- One Piece graphic novel → Alex (manga)
- War and Peace American film → Perry (old movies)
- War and Peace novel → Tyson (historical fiction novels)
- Starbucks gift card → Lucy (coffee)
- Foam exercise mat → Georgette (yoga)
- Galileo Galilei biography → Miguel (astronomy)
- Raku programming guide → Fred (Perl/Raku)

Only Rebecca’s interests (cars, dogs, chocolate) are unmatched, so the missing gift would have been for Rebecca. Therefore, the person assigned to Rebecca did not give a gift.

FINAL ANSWER: Rebecca
